body:
Hi everybody

Can you please help me through

I have got this simple problem after updating Honeybee and Ladybug with update component.

what should I do to fix the problem?



thanks a lot

replies.body: Hi farzane, your HBzone is not closed, you have a 'Null Brep' in this part here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1YrTBMOhwpzEhxxROBDo-RnIuZPUDayuuwYYfgScnwlOqsLSp82gs8KJV6wA9Ha7J04NGBW-BDWoRoL9X5b825e/open_brep_.png) You are right about the error message, in fact I have modified some HB HB lines to run the component. The lines are:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1YOAp3yb7IVhY1*CAgAAAEN45cLJU*lIwGsnK1lAC-jgsLmUQ-krEXlJ6m8sFz8xjLuZhM-0WTDdiy6KlP4dMKY/HBHB.png) I have closed your HBzone and managed the exception and your file works fine. About the exception I have to ask to Mostapha and Chris. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2FjpMK*bX1aGubwbnVlNABcdsabD6Af9jptcNXWwT-nJklU8kLCDrGCBTZWZidVzZypKPWE*v8s2HAidtjEj7Z6HaZYW*s4m/HBHB__.png) Best Antonello
Hi Antonello, Is this a bug or a user error? We're releasing a new version and I want to make sure that we will have this one fixed if this is a bug.

Thank you so much Antonello

In fact I used Chris's file (honeybee energy modeling) to create hbzones by myself and before updating everything was fine but after new version I got this error.

Farzane, Antonello, and Mostapha,



This was code that I had added in yesterday to fix a very rare bug but it apparently created several much more common bugs.  I have removed it and everything should be back to normal:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/d34f5e23bb2c7bb...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/d34f5e23bb2c7bbd392559da0d0b3e0be3078a6f)



Sorry for the inconvenience here.

-Chris

Now everything is perfect...

Thanks a lot Chris
